data.reddit:
Age: 19
Sex: male
Heigh: 5’9
Weight: 88kg
Race: white
Duration of complaint: 1 year-present
Existing relevant medical issues: social anexity and agoraphobia
Current medications: zoloft 100mg, quetiapin 25mg 

TL;DR - Got kicked from a csgo team and a «gaming group» and felt sadness, anexity and depression and want to know how to deal with it and what this emotion is really called

So long story but i’ve had this feeling before and it feels like a mix of depression, anexity, sadness, anger and grief

About 3 years ago I was in this e-sport CS:GO team with a 5 friends and I had some of the best and worst time of my life and we went to LANs and everything and thinking about the past makes me sad now. 
So a year ago I was kicked from this same team and it broke me so mentally that I was down for months. I get sad thinking about it, and it happend again recently

Since 2 years ago I was co owining this gaming group and my co owner recently left it and another owner came in and kicked me out and I felt the same feeling, yet not the same pain as last time, but still enough for me to want to cry

It got better but a year since it first happend I still feel really sad about it and most of the time it’s fine but I’m just really depressed

Two questions regarding this story
1) what is this emotion called?
2) how do I help getting past all this
